Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Relates to the protection of consumer genetic data in financial distress
Summary: Enacts the "genetic privacy and protection act" to require the mandatory deletion of genetic data upon financial distress or bankruptcy; prohibits the sale, transfer, or continued use of genetic data without explicit and renewed consent from the original consumer; provides for attorney general enforcement.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale, transfer, or continued use of consumer genetic data upon financial distress, bankruptcy, or dissolution of a company handling such data
